HOW TO USE:

1Ô∏è‚É£ YipYip is an always-on search assistant that turns Gmail (and any other website) into a keyboard-first product.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Just type to search.

3Ô∏è‚É£ YipYip highlights any buttons or links in the page matching your search.

PRIVACY PROMISE:

YipYip only tracks who has the extension installed and how often it is used. It will NEVER track or store your queries or which websites you visit. The project is open source on GitHub so you can verify this yourself.
